str2: Last, at the last, finally, till the end. A superlative probably from echo; farthest, final.
Hated, hostile; subst: an enemy. From a primary echtho; hateful; usually as a noun, an adversary.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From kata and argeo; to be entirely idle, literally or figuratively.
Death, physical or spiritual. From thnesko; death.
